content: FYI - draft spec comming up on ePI: https://github.com/EuropeanMedicinesAgency/ePI-consultation - anyone else involved?
More up to date information also listed on https://www.ema.europa.eu/en/human-regulatory/marketing-authorisation/product-information-requirements#electronic-product-information-initiative-section
You know if they plan to make an IG as well?

The team tend to prefer IGs in the form of documents (i.e. word/pdf) I think because of some documentation standards and ease of review in the early stages before the details are concrete. But I can imagine - and will push for - actual FHIR profiles and IGs at some stage.
Now moved to https://hl7-eu.github.io/gravitate-health/ in order to support R4B
